programme.desc: Randolph Scott plays a bounty hunter on the trail of three murderers who robbed a train. However, his investigation uncovers some murky secrets in the town of Twin Forks.
programme.title: The Bounty Hunter

programme.desc: John Wayne stars as a moody young man living in the Ozarks who has sworn revenge on his long-absent father for deserting his mother. Then a kindly stranger appears on the scene...
programme.title: The Shepherd of the Hills

programme.desc: In Cy Endfield's epic 1890s-set drama, Michael Caine and Stanley Baker play two British officers charged with defending Rorke's Drift from a force of 4000 Zulus. War violence.
programme.title: Zulu

programme.desc: James Cameron talks about the creation of the planet Pandora for his new film Avatar.
programme.title: Avatar Special

programme.desc: Raquel Welch - in her famous fur bikini - stars in this prehistoric adventure set in an inhospitable landscape populated by roving dinosaurs and two warring tribes.
programme.title: One Million Years B.C.

programme.desc: Wes Anderson's acclaimed and witty stop-motion animated version of Roald Dahl's children's classic. With the voices of George Clooney, Meryl Streep, Owen Wilson and Jarvis Cocker. [AD,S]
programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox

programme.desc: Romantic comedy. Cameron Diaz and Ashton Kutcher meet in Las Vegas. Together they get very drunk, marry and win a fortune. Then their troubles really begin... [AD,S]
programme.title: What Happens in Vegas

programme.desc: Violent supernatural horror starring Arnold Schwarzenegger as a run-down, alcoholic ex-cop, who takes on The Devil himself.
programme.title: End of Days

programme.desc: The alien Predator is back, hunting the streets of Los Angeles for his prey. But when he starts taking on the police, Danny Glover gets tough. Strong language/violence.
programme.title: Predator 2

programme.subtitle: ...Special
programme.desc: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Rhys Ifans and director Marc Webb talk about bringing the new version of Spider-Man to the screen.
programme.title: Amazing Spider-Man Interview...
